# 2018 Governor ####
Gov18 <-nycdb %>% 
  dcast.data.table(subset = .(Event == "PE_2018"
                              & Office == "Governor"), 
                   formula = formula, 
                   fun.aggregate = sum,
                   value.var = "votes")

Error in check_formula(formula, names(data), valnames) : 
  Invalid formula. Cast formula should be of the form LHS ~ RHS, for e.g., a + b ~ c.
